name: vector-data-management-system
description: A better way to manage vector data at scale for both businesses and developers via a normalized programmatic interface.
author: Timothy Carambat (Mintplex Labs)

scripts.dev:setup: node devSetup.js && cd backend && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd ../workers && yarn
scripts.lint: cd backend && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint && cd ../workers && yarn lint
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset
